hooks.prompt: Evaluate whether the requirements for the code being written are sufficiently clear. Requirements are clear if they specify: (1) what module/component is affected, (2) which users/entities are referenced (if applicable), and (3) what success looks like. Return {"ok": true} if requirements are clear, otherwise return {"ok": false, "systemMessage": "Requirements unclear - please clarify [specific gap]"} with details about what needs clarification.
